user_question: What are the effects of ocean acidification on coral reefs, and can you generate an image of a healthy coral reef?
final_answer: Ocean acidification leads to weaker coral skeletons and reduced biodiversity. Image of a healthy coral reef generated. It can also impair fish sensory functions and alter behavior, affecting survival and reproduction.
